g.onclick: if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {exit();; };
if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {formopen('test');; };

text.style: text-anchor: end; dominant-baseline: central; -webkit-user-select: none;fill : yellow;font-size: 18;;

g.onclick: if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {var txtel= document.getElementById('calcpopup___popup_sensorcalc_sensor_text'); if (txtel) { var newtxt= txtel.textContent+'1'; var fltnew = parseFloat(newtxt); if (fltnew==fltnew || newtxt=='-') {txtel.textContent = newtxt;}}; };

if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {var txtel= document.getElementById('calcpopup___popup_sensorcalc_sensor_text'); if (txtel) { var newtxt= txtel.textContent+'2'; var fltnew = parseFloat(newtxt); if (fltnew==fltnew || newtxt=='-') {txtel.textContent = newtxt;}}; };

if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {var txtel= document.getElementById('calcpopup___popup_sensorcalc_sensor_text'); if (txtel) { var newtxt= txtel.textContent+'.'; var fltnew = parseFloat(newtxt); if (fltnew==fltnew || newtxt=='-') {txtel.textContent = newtxt;}}; };

if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {var txtel= document.getElementById('calcpopup___popup_sensorcalc_sensor_text'); if (txtel) { var newtxt= txtel.textContent+'0'; var fltnew = parseFloat(newtxt); if (fltnew==fltnew || newtxt=='-') {txtel.textContent = newtxt;}}; };

if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {var txtel= document.getElementById('calcpopup___popup_sensorcalc_sensor_text'); if (txtel) {if (txtel.textContent.length>0) {txtel.textContent=txtel.textContent.substring(0, txtel.textContent.length-1);}}; };

if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {var txtel= document.getElementById('calcpopup___popup_sensorcalc_sensor_text'); if (txtel) { var newtxt= txtel.textContent+'-'; var fltnew = parseFloat(newtxt); if (fltnew==fltnew || newtxt=='-') {txtel.textContent = newtxt;}}; };

if ((!this.getAttribute) || (this.getAttribute('state')!='disable')) {var popuptmp= document.getElementById('calcpopup___popup_body'); if (popuptmp) {if (popuptmp.clearpopup) {popuptmp.clearpopup();}}; };
